nodes.text: Kalas-Na was a male Voss commando living on Voss during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he was part of the group of Voss that left the planet as part of the entourage for the Voss Mystic Gaden-Ko, traveling with him on the Barsen'thor's Defender-class light corvette. Kalas-Na and his commandos participated in the assault on the Harrower-class dreadnought Javelin and later assisted in liberating the Guardian Holds during the Battle of Corellia.
Kalas-Na appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Jedi Consular class mission on Corellia.
